odorElimination.title: Traps The Smell (Doesn't Mask It)
odorElimination.description: Air fresheners layer perfume on top of the problem. Purrify's activated carbon actually captures ammonia molecules and locks them away. The smell is gone â€” not hiding.

catFriendly.title: Water-Filter Grade Carbon
catFriendly.description: Made from coconut shells using the same process that makes drinking water safe. Zero chemicals. Zero fragrances. Zero mystery ingredients. Just pure, natural odor control.

longLastingFreshness.title: One Sprinkle Lasts A Whole Week
longLastingFreshness.description: Most fresheners fade after a day. Purrify keeps working for 7 full days â€” that's one quick sprinkle per litter change, not a daily chore.

natural.title: 100% Natural Ingredients
natural.description: Made from coconut shell activated carbon with no synthetic fragrances or fillers. Non-toxic and chemicals-free.

worksWithAnyLitter.title: Works With Any Litter

costEffective.title: Makes Your Litter Last Longer
costEffective.description: When odors stay under control, you're not tempted to dump the whole box early. Fresh-smelling litter means changing on schedule â€” not out of desperation.

benefitsSection.sectionHeader: Turn Cat Odor Problems Into a Thing of the Past
benefitsSection.title: Benefits of Purrify
benefitsSection.subtitle: Discover why Purrify is the perfect solution for cat owners who want a fresh-smelling home.

items.title: Odor Elimination
items.description: Purrify's advanced formula effectively eliminates unpleasant litter box odors at their source. Say goodbye to the lingering smells that can permeate your home and welcome a fresher, more inviting environment for both you and your furry friend.

items.title: Simple
items.description: Purrify is formulated with simple coconut shells, activated to soak up odor. You can trust that you're providing your cat with a clean smelling box environment without exposing them to chemicals or toxins.

items.title: Cost-Effective
items.description: Purrify helps extend the life of your cat's litter by preventing odor buildup, which means you'll need to change the litter less frequently. This not only saves you money but also reduces waste, making it a win-win for both your wallet and the environment.

steps.title: Open the Bag
steps.description: That's the hardest part. Seriously. No measuring, no mixing bowls, no instruction manual required.

steps.title: Sprinkle on Fresh Litter
steps.description: A light layer on top of your cat's favorite litter. Works with clay, crystal, clumping, natural â€” whatever they're already happy with.

steps.title: Mix & Enjoy the Clean
steps.description: Give it a gentle stir. Now enjoy 7 days of not thinking about the litter box. Your nose (and your guests) will thank you.

howItWorks.coconutDescription: Pure, sustainable coconut shells are activated with filtered, pure, high pressure steam to open millions of holes, tunnels, and passage-ways to lock away odor molecules.
howItWorks.transitionTeaser: And here's why cat parents love it even more...

agitationSection.headline: You Know That Moment...
paragraphs: You walk in the door after a long day. And there it is. That smell.
The one that hits you before you've even taken off your coat.
The one you've stopped noticing... until company comes over. Until your mother-in-law wrinkles her nose. Until you catch your friend doing that subtle sniff at the door.
You love your cat. But that litter box? It's a ticking time bomb of ammonia.
And here's the worst part: Air fresheners aren't fixing it. They're just spraying perfume on top of a problem.
The smell is still there. Lurking. Waiting. Ready to assault anyone who walks through your door.
agitationSection.pivot: But what if it didn't have to be this way?
agitationSection.transition: Cat parents across Canada are discovering something that actually works. And it takes 30 seconds...

ui.floatingCardDescription: Litter box odors can travel 20 ft in seconds.
